channel.title: Open Source on Notre Dame Linux Users Group
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Notre Dame Linux Users Group

item.title: Tensorflow
item.description: Secretary Andrew Litteken talks about the basics and how to get started with Tensorflow.

item.title: Say hello to chat.ndlug.org!
item.description: Everyone say hello to chat.ndlug.org, NDLUG’s very own host dedicated to chatting!

item.title: Programming Languages and Open Source
item.description: Secratary Andrew Litteken walks us through how to build a compiler for a programming language and the open source space.

item.title: HacktoberFest and Contributing to Open Source
item.description: In the midst of HacktoberFest, President Tim Burchfield (8bit) talks about contibuting to Open Source.
